name: Dodgy Dice
description:
Oh craps! Can you survive the Domino invasion?

Dodgy Dice is a top down, vampire-survivor-like bullet hell where the character is a multi sided die. Each time a die is rolled, a number is generated and used to fuel various behaviors of the game.

Dice can be rolled, for example, when the character dodge rolls, when certain enemies are killed, certain objects are interacted with, or at specified intervals. 

Defeat the vampires of the domino kingdom to level up your character and bolster your power with Pet Dice that grant special abilities based on which ones you choose.

How long can you survive?
